thread.section_title: Figo Pet Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figo Pet Insurance | figopetinsurance.com
thread.title: Toby Moore
thread.title_full: Figo Pet Insurance reviewed by Toby Moore

author: Toby Moore
title: Toby Moore
text: Figo is amazing. My cat got sick The day after the two week waiting period and she died shortly thereafter. I expected Figo to deny my claim. They didn't. They took care of everything and I am so grateful. I've recommended to all my friends and family to buy Figo immediately.
